thread.title: BRIEF-Bankwell Financial Q1 Net Income $4.6 Million

title: BRIEF-Bankwell Financial Q1 Net Income $4.6 Million
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Bankwell Financial Group Inc:
* BANKWELL FINANCIAL GROUP REPORTS FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME OF $4.6 MILLION OR $0.59 PER SHARE, REPRESENTING 24% YEAR OVER YEAR GROWTH AND DECLARES SECOND QUARTER DIVIDEND
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 6 PERCENT TO $15 MILLION * BOARD OF DIRECTORS DECLARED A $0.12 PER SHARE CASH DIVIDEND
* TANGIBLE BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE AT MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $21.12
* TOTAL GROSS LOANS APPROACHED $1.6 BILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018 * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $13.7 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 6% COMPARED TO QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
